channel.title: anne_hartebrodt on Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content in anne_hartebrodt on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: During her Master thesis, Anne developed a probabilistic approach for KeyPathwayMiner. pKPM accepts p-values rather than discrete values as input and allows for growing subnetworks under tight FDR control, i.e. without the need for choosing parameters K and L as it is the case in the current version of KPM. Anne moved to Odense where she starts a PhD in the RÃ¶ttger lab.
